overview: Raz is an experienced entrepreneur and a multidiscipline engineer. Raz was the leading system engineer of the ‘Miniature Inertial Systems’ development for the airborne division of Elbit Systems, one of Israel’s major defense technology companies. Raz’s fields of expertise range from software engineering (board design, FPGA design, C & C# programming) Digital Signal Processing (DSP), algorithms and system engineering to architecture and visual design. As part of Raz’s exciting life and search for adventure he served as a commander and an officer in the Israeli Air Force, flew private jets, and owned an aviation company specializing in private luxury flights.
